db_fTicket module¶

db_fTicket.insert_ticket(description, creator, responsible)¶

Inserts ticket in table.

Parameters:
  • description (LongText) – Text of the ticket
  • creator (User) – User who created the ticket
  • responsible (User) – User assigned to the ticket
Returns:

Ticket object, or None if IntegrityError
db_fTicket.get_ticket(id)¶

Retrieves ticket object from database.

Parameters:id (Integer) – Identifier of the ticket to retrieve
Returns:Ticket object, or None if DoesNotExist
db_fTicket.get_all_registers(sort=False, value=None)¶

Obtains all the registers of the Ticket table. Admits a sorting option.

Parameters:
  • sort (Boolean) – If True, will sort
  • value (String) – By which field will be the registers sorted (id, createTime, creator, responsible, priority, state)
Returns:

SelectQuery with the registers
db_fTicket.select_ticket(id=None, creator=None, responsible=None, priority=None, state=None)¶

Obtains a query of tickets which fulfill a list of requirments.

Parameters:
  • id (Integer) – Ticket identifier to search
  • creator (User) – User to search as ticket creator
  • responsible (User) – User to search as ticket responsible
  • priority (String) – Ticket priority to search
  • state (String) – Ticket state to search
Returns:

SelectQuery with the registers
db_fTicket.get_id(ticket)¶

Returns the identifier of a ticket.

Parameters:ticket (Ticket) – Ticket object
Returns:Integer
db_fTicket.get_responsible(ticket)¶

Returns the responsible of a ticket.

Parameters:ticket (Ticket) – Ticket object
Returns:User
db_fTicket.get_priority(ticket)¶

Returns the priority of a ticket.

Parameters:ticket (Ticket) – Ticket object
Returns:String
db_fTicket.get_state(ticket)¶

Returns the state of a ticket.

Parameters:ticket (Ticket) – Ticket object
Returns:String
db_fTicket.update_responsible(ticket, new)¶

Modifies the responsible field.

Parameters:
  • ticket (Ticket) – Ticket to be modified
  • new (User) – New responsible
db_fTicket.update_priority(ticket, new)¶

Modifies the priority field.

Parameters:
  • ticket (Ticket) – Ticket to be modified
  • new (String) – New priority
db_fTicket.update_state(ticket, new)¶

Modifies the state field.

Parameters:
  • ticket (Ticket) – Ticket to be modified
  • new (String) – New state
db_fTicket.info_ticket(ticket)¶

Returns a list with the basic info (id, time created, responsible’s username, priority, state, number of comments) of a ticket.

Parameters:ticket (Ticket) – Ticket object
Returns:List
db_fTicket.string_ticket(ticket)¶

Formats and returns a string with all the info of a ticket.

Parameters:ticket (Ticket) – Ticket object
Returns:String
db_fTicket.print_ticket(ticket)¶

Debug function. Prints ticket data (id, createTime, description, creator’s username, responsible’s username, priority, state, num. comments).

Parameters:ticket (Ticket object) – Ticket whose data will be printed
